DOC.brief_summary: Employees Blue Shield California ( BSC ) recruit participate regularly use Walkstations . Some participant randomly assign `` hold '' control condition remainder assign one two experimental treatment : Personal Incentive vs. Charitable Incentive . In Personal Incentive condition people pay $ 3 every complete Walkstation session , whereas participant Charitable Incentive condition $ 3 donate specific charity . The incentive operate approximately 45 day additional 45 day participant two experimental condition access Walkstations . Participants hold control condition begin use Walkstations initial 90 day period .
DOC.criteria: Must pas ParQ Ineligible person pas ParQ AND provide doctor 's note authorize participation .
